cards.flavor: She bears the scars of an ancient calamity. To protect her children, she would live through it again.
cards.name: Aelani, Mother of All

rulings.text: This means noncreature permanents will never enter the battlefield.

cards.text:
Vigilance, reach
As a noncreature spell resolves, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

cards.name: Aid of the Ancients
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if creatures you control have a total power of 10 or greater or you control six or more lands.
Create two 6/6 green and white Elk creature tokens.

cards.name: Alpine Meadow
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Alpine Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.

changes: 2024-02-01 — Changed -3 from "Add six {R}. Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards."
cards.name: Amelie Mayn
cards.text:
[+2]: Add {R}{R}. Until end of turn, red mana doesn't empty as steps and phases end, and creatures you control gain “{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”
[-3]: You may cast a monocolored red spell with mana value 6 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
[-6]: You may pay any amount of {R}. When you do, Amelie Mayn deals that much damage to each of up to that many different targets.

cards.name: Ancient Counsel
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.
{5}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Ancient Counsel: Create a 6/6 green and white Elk creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: It is the duty of the great to lend their strength to the small.
cards.name: Ancient Gift
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Then if that creature has power 10 or greater, each other creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Angelfire
cards.text:
Angelfire deals X damage to up to one target.
If only {R} was spent to cast this spell and X is 5 or more, Angelfire deals X damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker your opponents control instead.

cards.flavor: Some mages who escape the demons' clutches flee to the Craterfields, using the leonin's pyromancy to ensure their continued freedom.
cards.name: Arcanist's Spellsurge
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain prowess. If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, draw a card.

cards.name: Armadillo Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

cards.name: Aryam the Dreamer
cards.text:
Hexproof
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a card from your hand on top of your library. You may shuffle.
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{2}{U}: Draw a card.

cards.name: Aurora's Whisper
cards.text:
Counter target creature spell. Scry 2.
Foresee — As you draw Aurora's Whisper, you may reveal it and pay {U}. When you do, return target creature with mana value 3 or less to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Battle-Blind Leonin
cards.text:
Haste
Glorious end — When Battle-Blind Leonin dies, if it was tapped, you may pay {B}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Beckon the Shadows

rulings.text: If another player gains control of Beckon the Shadows after it is cast, they will not get the additional effect even if the bloodprice was paid.

cards.text:
Bloodprice {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you cast this spell for its bloodprice, return that card to the battlefield instead.

cards.name: Binding Stones
cards.text:
Flash
When Binding Stones enters the battlefield, exile target creature with power 3 or less until Binding Stones leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Bittersweet Reunion
cards.text:
You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Bittersweet Reunion is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it. If you do, you may copy it and cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: As her last act of sanity, the angel tore out her eyes. She could no longer bear the sight of the carnage she wreaked.
cards.name: Blinded Avenger
cards.text:
Flying
Glorious end — When Blinded Avenger dies, if it was tapped, destroy target creature you don't control.

cards.flavor: In the brutal hierarchy of the Gloaming cults, no skill is as valued as being able to get inside your enemies' heads.
cards.name: Breach the Mind
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller discards two cards.

cards.name: Brutal Champion
cards.text: Glorious end — When Brutal Champion dies, if it was tapped, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: Most of what is left of the old world is shattered and disparate, but some more resilient works do remain.
cards.name: Carven Guardian
cards.text: {2}: Carven Guardian gains reach until end of turn.

cards.name: Children of the Clouds
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if an opponent controls two or more nonwhite creatures or you control six or more lands.
Create X 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. You gain X life.

cards.name: Cloud Sovereign
cards.text:
Flying
{U}: Put Cloud Sovereign on top of its owner's library.
Foresee — As you draw Cloud Sovereign, you may reveal it and pay {1}{W}. When you do, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: Animated by a drop of blood and the foul miasma of the Gloam, the undying legions of Ligos march to war.
cards.name: Conjured Shade
cards.text: When Conjured Shade dies, target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Consuming Knowledge

rulings.text: If another player gains control of Consuming Knowledge after it is cast, they will not get the additional effect even if the bloodprice was paid.

cards.text:
Bloodprice {2}{U} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Draw two cards. If you cast this spell for its bloodprice, instead scry 4, then draw two cards.

cards.flavor:
“I saw the sky bleed that day. As angels fell screaming from the heavens and the earth splintered like rotten wood at their impact, I gathered the few children I could and ran.”
—Aelani, Mother of All
cards.name: Crimson Sunrise
cards.text: Crimson Sunrise deals 4 damage to each creature. Each player sacrifices four nonbasic lands.

cards.name: Dark Huntress
cards.text:
Bloodprice {4}{B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are five or more creature cards in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Demon creature token.

cards.flavor:
“For how precious a mortal soul is, it resides in a disappointingly fragile fortress.”
—Ulric of Ligas
cards.name: Desiccate
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if you have 10 or less life or if you control six or more lands.
All creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “The inviolate rule—a life for a life. Selene will usher in a new age of smoke on the corpses of your kind.”
cards.name: Diabolic Designs
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. You may return up to one target Demon creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: No matter the contract, a demon's price is the same—heart's blood, the last few drops as the light leaves the eyes.
cards.name: Divine in Blood
cards.text: Divine in Blood deals 2 damage to target player, then that player draws four cards.

cards.flavor: “The demonic incursions reach further into the glades each day. Soon, that accursed smoke will be visible from the Temple itself.”
cards.name: Dryad Outrider
cards.text: Reach

cards.flavor: The groves of the Wardens have grown undisturbed for hundreds of years. Some have developed a desire to explore further from their roots.
cards.name: Dryad of the Grove
cards.text: {T}: Untap target basic land.

cards.name: Dust Barrens
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Target player exiles a nonland card from their graveyard.

cards.name: Elvish Songseeker
cards.text:
Defiance (Whenever this creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Elvish Songseeker has a +1/+1 counter on it, exile the top card of your library. Until your next turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Elvish Verseblade
cards.text:
Defiance (Whenever this creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)
{4}{R}: Elvish Verseblade deals 1 damage to each creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: At the heart of each summoning lies one inviolate rule—a life for a life.
cards.name: Emissary of Smoke
cards.text: Bloodprice {2}{B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)

cards.name: Exultation of Might
cards.text:
Reach, trample
Revive {4}{G} ({4}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: There is a sanctuary beyond sight for those who submit themselves to it.
cards.name: Fade Into Mists
cards.text: Exile target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Ferocity of the Redeemed
cards.text:
When Ferocity of the Redeemed enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Revive {2}{W}{W} ({2}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Though they lose their memories, the spirits of the Wardens retain the virtues of their previous lives.
cards.name: Fidelity of the Pure
cards.text:
When Fidelity of the Pure leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Elk Spirit creature token.
Revive {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Fiery Chasm
cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Fiery Chasm enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Frilled Hydra
cards.text:
Frilled Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Defiance (Whenever this creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)
Frilled Hydra has hexproof as long as it's defiant.

cards.flavor: The only thing more honorable than death in battle is to die twice.
cards.name: Gift to the Gloam
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control with two +1/+1 counters on it, except it's a black Demon instead of its other colors and types.

cards.flavor: Most disciples of the Gloaming do not survive their apprenticeship. Those that do, therefore, have plenty of raw material to work with.
cards.name: Gloaming Smokeweaver
cards.text: Gloaming Smokeweaver has deathtouch as long as there is a creature card in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: The choristers are the composers of the Pyrsesong, singing the tales of triumphant warriors in battle for the first time.
cards.name: Glorybound Chorister
cards.text: Whenever Glorybound Chorister attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other attacking creature you control.

cards.flavor:
“A true treasure cannot be traded. It can only be shared.”
—Aelani, Mother of All
cards.name: Golden Glade
cards.text:
Golden Glade enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of any one color.

cards.flavor:
“What are you worried about? They're just big statues, you gecko.”
—Adventurer Telam, last words
cards.name: Granite Watchers
cards.text:
Defender
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Granite Watchers: It deals 3 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: Even before the Wardens, the forest had its guardians.
cards.name: Great Sable Stag
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Protection from blue and from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything blue or black.)

cards.flavor: Weeping bloody tears, the last of the angels exact their revenge on an innocent world.
cards.name: Grieving Revenant
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Grieving Revenant attacks, it deals 1 damage to each other creature you control.

cards.flavor: Despite the horrors of the Gloaming, the endless war of the angels and the leonin, the bloodthirsty elves of the Pyresong, and the poisonous plants and biting insects of the forest, some still call the Highlands beautiful.
cards.name: Grove's Respite
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Some minds, though shattered, retain some recollection of their original purpose.
cards.name: Hallowed Executioner
cards.text:
Flying
When Hallowed Executioner enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.

cards.flavor: Fragments from the craterfields can be found embedded in the mountainsides, surrounded by a soft, warm aura.
cards.name: Hallowed Fragment
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

cards.name: Heart's Desire
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if you control a legendary creature or if you control six or more lands.
Exile a planeswalker card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.

cards.name: Heartless Pact
cards.text:
Bloodprice {U} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

cards.name: Hesediel, the Reborn
cards.text:
First strike, lifelink
Once each turn, when another nontoken creature you control dies, you may create a 2/2 white Elk Spirit creature token with first strike and lifelink named Fawn of Hesediel.

cards.flavor: Some few souls resist the allure of the demonic cults, preferring asceticism to study their own unique magics.
cards.name: Hexfang Ascetic
cards.text:
Flash
When Hexfang Ascetic enters the battlefield, return target spell to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: Its antlers are the morning frost, its hooves the sound of snowfall.
cards.name: Highland Elk
cards.text: Whenever Highland Elk deals damage to a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand (if it's still on the battlefield.)

cards.name: Highland Vale
cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Highland Vale enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: If you hear them coming, it is a warning. You will not hear them strike.
cards.name: Hushwing Sentinel
cards.text: Flying, vigilance

cards.flavor: To the elves, the relentless beat of the Pyresong and the sounds of weapons cleaving flesh are a singular rhythm.
cards.name: Hymn of Fury
cards.text: Hymn of Fury deals 1 damage to each creature, then each creature you control gains haste and double strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Even in a world with dragons, demons, and hydras, the mundane bear remains near the top of food chain.
cards.name: Indomitable Bear
cards.text: Sacrifice Indomitable Bear: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Even broken and dead, he stirs.
cards.name: Invoking the Name
cards.text: Search your library for a Demon card or a black card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put that card in your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Jejun, Dark Hunter
cards.text:
Bloodprice {B}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Lifelink, haste
Sacrifice another Demon: Jejun, Dark Hunter gains flying and indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: It roams the mountains, spreading wild flowers for a purpose lost to time.
cards.name: Joyous Chromatelk
cards.text:
As Joyous Chromatelk enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

cards.flavor: The earth splits at her approach, pouring forth the weapons of her art.
cards.name: Lavamancer Adept
cards.text:
First strike
{R}, Discard a land card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Lavamancer Adept. It gains menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “My nation is still growing, like a precious, blooming flower. Ash is an excellent soil.”
cards.name: Leija, the Bloodied Queen
cards.text: Whenever Leija, the Bloodied Queen attacks, you may pay {R}{R}{R}{R}. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each other creature, each player, and each planeswalker.

cards.flavor: Her knives slice through enchantment as easily as they skin rabbits.
cards.name: Leija's Greenblade
cards.text: When Leija's Greenblade enters the battlefield, you may pay {G}. If you do, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: When a demon is slain, its consciousness returns to Ligos. No thoughts occupy that unhallowed place but vengeance.
cards.name: Ligos, Shadow's Source
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}.
{7}{B}{B}, Exile Ligos, Shadow's Source from your hand: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: Shamans of the Windwise watch their migratory routes, each movement of the herd a portent of the future.
cards.name: Long-Finned Skywhale
cards.text:
Flying
Long-Finned Skywhale can block only creatures with flying.

cards.flavor: Past the blinding ash storms, the flowing lava fields, the shattered landscape, and the rage of the angels lay the treasures of a fallen age.
cards.name: Magmatic Cache
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land and discard a card.
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor: The only leonin more respected that the one who leads the warband is the one who arms them.
cards.name: Meteoric Smith
cards.text: {3}{R}: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Migration Range
cards.text:
Search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{3}{W}, Exile Migration Range from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 green and white Elk Spirit creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Mind-Mute
cards.text:
As Mind-Mute enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
{5}: Return Mind-Mute to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The denizens of the forest, whether flesh or spirit, do not take kindly to intruders.
cards.name: Moonlit Pursuit
cards.text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn if it has a +1/+1 counter on it. Then it fights target creature you don't control.

cards.flavor: Returned by the grace of Hesediel, he now fights with the strength of oldwood and the patience of a forest.
cards.name: Oaken Spearman
cards.text:
Defender, first strike
{1}{G}: Oaken Spearman can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

cards.flavor: On Astento, there are no vampires. Blood is too precious a resource to be wasted on the dead.
cards.name: Onyx Ritualist
cards.text:
Flying
Spells your opponents cast cost an additional 2 life to cast.

cards.flavor: With a smile that wide, you just can't keep it down for long.
cards.name: Persistent Fiend
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}. If you do, return Persistent Fiend from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: “Today we make our name!”
cards.name: Pyresong Aspirant
cards.text:
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
{1}{R}{G}: Pyresong Aspirant deals 1 damage to target creature. You may have that creature gain hexproof until end of turn.

changes: 2021-08-01 — Is now a Ranger rather than a Warrior.
cards.name: Pyresong Ranger
cards.text:
Defiance (Whenever this creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)
As long as Pyresong Ranger has a +1/+1 counter on it, it has vigilance and “{T}: Add {G}{G}.”

cards.name: Rain Zai, Spiritscale
cards.text:
[+1]: Mill two cards. Create a 1/1 green Spirit Snake creature token.
[0]: You may sacrifice a Spirit. When you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: Exile another target nonland permanent until Rain Zai leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.

cards.name: Read the Clouds
cards.text:
Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
Foresee — As you draw Read the Clouds, you may reveal it and pay {1}{U}. When you do, scry 2, then draw a card.

cards.name: Reaping Mask
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has deathtouch and “When this creature dies, create a 2/2 black Demon creature token.”
{1}{B}, Exile Reaping Mask from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Demon creature token.

cards.name: Rebellious Streak
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste and defiance until end of turn. (Whenever that creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)

cards.flavor: No mercy, no recognition, no remorse. Only fire, and an all-consuming fury.
cards.name: Reckless Rage
cards.text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

cards.name: Remembrance of Light
cards.text:
When Remembrance of Light enters the battlefield, you may return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
Revive—{4}{G}, Discard a card. ({4}{G}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: There was a time, long ago, when the glimpse of an angel was considered a good omen.
cards.name: Remnants of Divinity
cards.text: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or tapped creature.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Now checks if damage was dealt on resolution instead of on targetting.
cards.flavor: “I never throw the first spear to kill. It's no fun without a little clawing and gurgling.”
cards.name: Rend
cards.text:
Rend deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you cast a black spell, you may pay {1} and exile Rend from your graveyard. If you do, destroy target creature or planeswalker if it was dealt damage this turn.

cards.name: Resolution of Stone
cards.text:
Trample
When Resolution of Stone enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Revive {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Rimebreath Tyrant
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Rimebreath Tyrant attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: “There are myriad methods by which I could wring those precious drops of blood from you. Let me count the ways...”
cards.name: Rite of the Dark Harvest
cards.text:
Bloodprice {B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Ritual of Coalescence
cards.text:
Bloodprice {2}{B} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)
Create X 2/2 black Demon creature tokens, where X is one plus the number of creatures that died this turn.

cards.flavor:
“We do not worship Grandfather. He is the last prisoner left to the Wardens.”
— Rain Zai, Spiritscale
cards.name: Rius, Temple of the Grandfather
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W}.
{6}{W}{W}{W}, Exile Rius, Temple of the Grandfather from your hand: Target player gains 20 life.

cards.flavor: Manifestations of the Aurora's unguided power, they impart their prophetic sight to those brave enough to seek it.
cards.name: Sage of the Aurora
cards.text:
Prowess
{U}: Sage of the Aurora gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Scion of Fecundity
cards.text:
When Scion of Fecundity enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Revive—{1}{G}{W}, Discard a card. ({1}{G}{W}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: “I've never understood why I am called heartless. I actually have quite the collection.”
cards.name: Selene the Cruel
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, sacrifice a permanent and draw a card.
Exile three cards from your graveyard: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Shattered Valkyrie
cards.text:
Flying
Glorious end — When Shattered Valkyrie dies, if it was tapped, draw a card for each creature that died this turn.
Sacrifice another creature: Shattered Valkyrie gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Silent Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
When Silent Griffin enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library.

cards.flavor: The mountain springs offer a unique magic—the ability to forget the body and dissolve into your memories.
cards.name: Silent Musing
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you controlled that creature, draw a card.

cards.flavor: The Pyresong tells the glory of hundreds of generations of elves. Its recitation takes weeks, and is accompanied by raucous celebration.
cards.name: Singers' Grove
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}.
{8}{G}, Exile Singers' Grove from your hand: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.

cards.name: Sleeping Dryads
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G}.
{G}, Sacrifice Sleeping Dryads: Draw a card.

cards.name: Smoke's Whispers
cards.text: Search target opponent's library for a card with mana value 3 or less and exile it with a smoke counter on it. Then that player shuffles. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as if it were any color to cast it.

cards.flavor: “Death is not an impediment. It is but a stepping stone.”
cards.name: Smokeweaver Initiate
cards.text: When Smokeweaver Initiate dies, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “I have spent my life studying these magics. Don't force me to turn my theory into practice.”
cards.name: Snowline Ascetic
cards.text:
Prowess
When Snowline Ascetic enters the battlefield, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.name: Sodden Cavern
cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Sodden Cavern enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: The demons of the Gloam don't need to inhabit bodies- they simply enjoy massacring the living in the skins of the dead.
cards.name: Soulcarver
cards.text: When Soulcarver enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target non-Demon creature. If you do, create a 2/2 black Demon creature token and draw a card.

cards.name: Spotless Mind
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if an opponent controls a creature with power 5 or greater or you control six or more lands.
Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

cards.flavor: Moonlight bends like steel around its antlers, weaving silver armor.
cards.name: Stag of the Moon
cards.text:
Lifelink
{2}{W}: Target Elk gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: A slain demon spends years plotting its revenge before a cultist summons them anew, and even longer enacting it.
cards.name: Stalker in the Underbrush
cards.text: Bloodprice {2}{U} (You may cast this card by sacrificing a creature and paying its bloodprice.)

cards.flavor: Water magic doesn't look scary until you remember that at such high altitudes, the temperature is close to freezing.
cards.name: Streamlash
cards.text:
Creatures your opponents control get -3/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Strength of the Patient
cards.text:
When Strength of the Patient enters the battlefield, if it was revived, put four +1/+1 counters on it.
Revive {4}{W}{W}{W} ({4}{W}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: “I carve each arrow with a name, taken from prey like you. My quiver is almost full, but I think I can make room for one more.”
cards.name: Surestrike Elite
cards.text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Surestrike Elite gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The power of prophecy is much like tea; the impatient are inevitably burned.
cards.name: Tea of Augury
cards.text: {U}, Exile a card from your hand or graveyard that doesn't share a type with a card exiled by Tea of Augury: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: A vast well of power, unguided and untouched since the Court fell.
cards.name: The Aurora's Heart
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U}.
{4}{U}{U}{U}, Exile The Aurora's Heart from your hand: Target player draws seven cards.

cards.flavor: Once a bastion of faith— now the smoldering shelter of its last, fallen survivors.
cards.name: The Court of Angels
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}.
{6}{R}{R}, Exile The Court of Angels from your hand: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: Seekers drown themselves in the pool at its roots to comprehend the web of fate. None emerge.
cards.name: The Tree of Wisdom
cards.text:
Defender
Your maximum hand size is thirteen.
{T}: If you have fewer than thirteen cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Toros the Warchief
cards.text:
Glorious end — When Toros the Warchief dies, if it was tapped, return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch.

cards.name: Tranquil Moment
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Each player skips their next combat step.
• Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells this turn.

cards.name: Tranquil Stream
cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Tranquil Stream enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Twilight Blade
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, Twilight Blade deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Their armor is forged of obsidian glass, the broken bodies of their kin fused by lava into jagged plates.
cards.name: Twisted Archangel
cards.text:
Flying, menace, haste
Twisted Archangel has indestructible as long as an opponent has four or more cards in hand.

cards.flavor: Noble is the forest's sovereign, and mighty are his people.
cards.name: Unbowed Hart
cards.text:
Whenever you cast another creature spell, create a 1/1 green and white Elk Spirit creature token.
As long as you control five or more Elk, creatures you control get +3/+3 and have trample.

cards.name: Unproven Champion
cards.text:
Trample
Defiance (Whenever this creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)

cards.flavor: The stone twists lifeblood into crawling runes, foretelling an even darker and more twisted future.
cards.name: Upon the Altar
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Vanquisher's Banner
cards.text:
As Vanquisher's Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

changes: 2021-07-03 — Originally "When Verdant Cloak enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature." and "Enchanted creature has “{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors.”"
cards.name: Verdant Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “{T}: Add one mana of any color. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.”

cards.flavor: The Pyresong is weeks long, and more than one verse is dedicated to the flames of glory.
cards.name: Verse of Fire
cards.text: Verse of Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among up to two targets.

cards.name: Vindictive Regent
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever a creature you control dies, Vindictive Regent gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: As gentle as rain. As righteous as lightning.
cards.name: Vitality of Blossoms
cards.text:
Lifelink
Vitality of Blossoms has indestructible as long as your life total is greater than your starting life total.

cards.flavor: Through the ash came a flash of red teeth. Jina inhaled to scream and died with her breath in her throat.
cards.name: Volcanic Pounce
cards.text:
Creatures you control gain haste and trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
“When the mists rise, more dangerous things than you walk with them. It would be wise not to anger them.”
—Warden ranger
cards.name: Waking Mists
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by non-Spirit creatures this turn.

cards.flavor: “I am not afraid of the divine. I have wet my blades on angelblood once, and they have been thirsty since.”
cards.name: Warband Commander
cards.text: Glorious end — When Warband Commander dies, if it was tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that attacked this turn.

cards.flavor: “The angels are living tempests—the fury of an ash-storm tempered with the finality of obsidian. What more worthy foe could there be?”
cards.name: Warband Lieutenant
cards.text:
Haste
Glorious end — When Warband Lieutenant dies, if it was tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

cards.flavor: Too wild to tame, too fast to hunt, too ferocious to ignore.
cards.name: Wastewolf
cards.text:
Trample, haste
Defiance (Whenever this creature takes damage, if it survives and wasn't defiant, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes defiant.)
Whenever Wastewolf attacks, it deals 1 damage to any other target.

cards.flavor:
Autumn rot and spreading molds
will feed the next spring's marigolds.
cards.name: Wealth of the Underbrush
cards.text: Mill five cards, then return up to one permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“Their little paws are so cute when they're not used to flying yet.”
—Amelie Mayn
cards.name: Wild Skycub
cards.text: As long as you control another creature with flying, Wild Skycub has flying.

cards.flavor: Lagogryphs are messengers of the oracles. To harm one risks the wrath of fate itself.
cards.name: Windwise Courier
cards.text:
Flying
Windwise Courier has indestructible as long as you've revealed a card from your hand this turn.

cards.flavor: Unfettered by reality, the inhabitants of the Aurora share their wisdom with those brave enough to visit them.
cards.name: Windwise Mentor
cards.text:
Flying
{3}{W}: Scry 2. You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: The sky tells the history of Astento- every moment of the past written in light, and every secret hidden by dusk.
cards.name: Written in the Stars
cards.text:
You may look at the top card of your library at any time.
Whenever one or more creatures attack you, you may pay {1}{U}. When you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Think of it as flattery. I consider you worth leaving alive.”
cards.name: Young Hieromancer
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, tap target creature an opponent controls.
